message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on a high-quality product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115 is a bit more in line with what I was thinking. Would you be willing to meet me at $115?
I'm still a bit hesitant at $115. I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can we meet in the middle at $110 is a bit too high for me, but $110 is a bit too low for you, so how about $108?
I see you're trying to get a good deal, Bob! I can appreciate that. However, I'm still not comfortable going below $110. How about we meet in the middle at $110, just like we discussed earlier?
I'm still not comfortable with $110. I'm willing to go up to $107, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can we meet somewhere in between?
